org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper

类 RegionNormalizerTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.ZKListener
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.ZKNodeTracker
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.RegionNormalizerTracker

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RegionNormalizerTracker
extends ZKNodeTracker
    Tracks region normalizer state up in ZK
